瘲字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　瘲； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页779第19
【唐韻】子用切【集韻】足用切，?音縱。【玉篇】瘛瘲，小兒病。【集韻】風病。【前漢·藝文志】金創瘲瘛方三十卷。【註】師古曰：瘲，音子用反。小兒病也。　又【集韻】將容切，縱平聲。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　疭; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 779 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Ziyong cut 【Jiyun】Foot use cut, sound vertical. [Jade articles] 疛疭, pediatric disease. [Ji Yun] Wind disease. [Previous Han·Art and Literature History] Thirty volumes of Jin Chuangyan's Fang. [Note] Shi Gu said: 疭, the phonetic word is reversed. Pediatric disease also.　 [Ji Yun] Cut the Rong, the sound is vertical and flat. The same meaning.
